sentence.text: The level of gene expression of activation of peripheral nervous system development-kappaB-inducing kinase activity, NF-kB, tumor necrosis factor-a (TNF-a), and interleukin-6 (IL-6) was measured by RT-PCR, and TNF-a, IL-6 levels in the cell supernatant were determined by ELISA.

The protein expression of activation of peripheral nervous system development-kappaB-inducing kinase activity and downstream molecules tumor necrosis factor receptor-associated factor 6 (protein polyubiquitination), inhibitor of nuclear factor kappa-B kinase (IKK), NF-kappa-B inhibitor alpha (IKBa), and NF-kB was detected by Western-blot analysis.
